bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/E2 tapered head tube, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, press fit BB, ISCG 05 mount, Closed Convert dropouts, G2 Geometry

components.description: Fox Evolution Series 32 Float w/CTD (climb-trail-descend) damper, rebound, E2 tapered steerer, 15QR thru axle, custom G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, 120mm travel
Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, 15mm alloy axle, centerlock front hub; Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, 142x12 alloy axle, centerlock rear hub w/Bontrager Duster 28-hole Tubeless Ready rims
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise
